i1.blurb: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.
description: {{sbc|Hextech Shrapnel Shells:}} '''Corki's''' [[basic attack]]s are permanently modified to deal {{as|20% AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and {{as|80% AD}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.

{{sbc|The Package:}} After 8 minutes have passed, ''{{ai|The Package|Corki}}'' is delivered to both corners of '''Corki's''' [[Spawn|fountain]], which he can pick up after {{ct|channel|channeling|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts}} for 1 second. Doing so grants him one cast of {{ai|Special Delivery|Corki}} within the next 60 seconds, as well as {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} out of combat prior to the ability being cast, after which ''{{ai|The Package|Corki}}'' goes on {{sti|cooldown}} before being delivered again.
i1.name: Hextech Munitions
notes: * All players are warned by Corki emitting a global siren/alarm sound upon picking up ''The Package''.
* Triggering attacks will apply [[on-hit effect]]s normally.
** The bonus damage from {{nie|Spellblade}} will not be consumed if the magic damage part is enough to kill the target.

** Furthermore, the bonus damage from physical {{nie|Spellblade}} effects (namely {{ii|Sheen}}, {{ii|Iceborn Gauntlet}}, and {{ii|Trinity Force}}) will be split evenly between physical and magic damage.
** The damage from {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} is not affected by ''Hextech Munitions''.
** Both components apply {{sti|life steal}} even though on-hit magic damage does not usually interact with it.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} amplify both components' damage.

q1.blurb: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' launches a bomb at the target area, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
The bomb {{tip|sight|reveals}} the area as it travels and for 6 seconds afterwards, as well as all affected enemies.
q1.name: Phosphorus Bomb

w1.blurb: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, dropping bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled, lasting for 2 seconds.
Any enemies that remain in the area are dealt {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|15 to 45}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|15*8 to 45*8}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Valkyrie
notes: * The trail is made up of three individual areas-of-effects (unlike {{cai|Poison Trail|Singed}} or {{cais|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}} trail being more fluid).

w2.blurb: Corki hurtles forward a long distance, knocking aside enemies and creating a trail of scorched earth that damages opponents who remain in it.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|The Package|Corki}} - Active:}} '''Corki''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location with extreme speed, {{tip|unstoppable}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} all enemies hit 500 units and leaving behind a fire trail for 5 seconds.

Any enemies that remain in the area are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% and dealt {{pp|18|7.5;7.5;7.5;7.5;7.5;7.5;7.5 to 17.5;20;22.5;25|formula=static 7.5 until lvl 7; then+1.25 until lvl 15, then+2.5|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, for a maximum of {{pp|18|7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20 to 17.5*20;20*20;22.5*20;25*20|formula=static 150 until lvl 7; then+25 until lvl 15, then+50|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 750% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}}.
w2.name: Special Delivery
notes: * Unlike {{ai|Valkyrie|Corki}}, the trail is fluid like {{cai|Poison Trail|Singed}} or {{cai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}}'s trail.

e1.blurb: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' activates his gatling gun and sprays bullets in a cone in front of him for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage every quarter-second and reducing his targets' {{sti|lethality|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} each tick, stacking up to 8 times, lingering for 2 seconds after last being damaged.
''Gatling Gun'' does not hinder '''Corki's''' actions and its cone remains in front of him as he moves.
leveling: {{st|Mixed Damage Per Quarter Second|{{ap|120/16 to 320/16}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|120 to 320}} {{as|(+ 160% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}{{st|Resistance Reduction Per Tick|{{ap|1 to 2.5}}|Total Resistance Reduction|{{ap|1*8 to 2.5*8}}}}
e1.name: Gatling Gun

r1.blurb: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Corki''' stores a charge of ''Missile Barrage'' periodically, up to a maximum of 7 at once, and starts with 7 missiles every time he [[Death|respawns]].
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' fires a missile in the target direction that explodes if it hits an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} in an area.
Every third missile '''Corki''' fires is a ''{{ai|Big One|Corki}}'', dealing 100% increased [[damage]] and increasing its explosion [[range|radius]].
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|90 to 140}} {{as|(+ {{ap|15 to 75}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Big One Magic Damage|{{ap|90*2 to 140*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|30 to 150}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Missile Barrage
